FuncDef:
The ima global-ima-group command adds a trunk serial interface to a global IMA-group interface.
The undo ima global-ima-group command deletes a trunk serial interface from a global IMA-group interface.
By default, a global IMA-group interface contains no trunk serial interfaces.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the number of an IMA-group interface.The value is in slot/card/group number format. The slot number and card number must be the same as those of the interface to be added to the IMA group.
-

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
After creating a global IMA-group interface, run the ima global-ima-group command to add a trunk serial interface to the global IMA-group interface.
Prerequisites
A global IMA-group interface has been created using the interface global-ima-group command.
Precautions
Before changing the link layer protocol of a trunk serial interface that has been added to a global IMA-group interface, remove the trunk serial interface from the global IMA-group interface.
